devdoc.details: Extension of Crowdsale contract that adds a funding goal, and the possibility of users getting a refund if goal is not met. Uses a RefundVault as the crowdsale's vault.

finalize().details: Must be called after crowdsale ends, to do some extra finalization work. Calls the contract's finalization function.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

devdoc.title: RefundableCrowdsale
